welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bustos, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our historic town, known for its beautiful rivers and bridges. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bustos has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for Cebu Pacific and other domestic airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
